MISSING_SONG_NAME: I didn't catch the song name.
SONG_NOT_FOUND: I didn't find a song called {{song}}.
ARTIST_NOT_FOUND: I didn't find an artist called {{artist}}.
SONG_NOT_FOUND_SUGGESTION: I didn't find a track called {{song}} by {{artist}}, you might have meant {{suggestion}}.
SONG_NOT_FOUND_BY_ARTIST: I didn't find a track called {{song}} by {{artist}}.
MISSING_PLAYLIST_NAME: I didn't catch the playlist name.
PLAYLIST_NOT_FOUND: I didn't find a playlist called {{playlist}}.
ADDED_PLAYLIST_SONGS: Added {{count}} songs from playlist {{playlist}} to the queue.
MISSING_GENRE: I didn't catch the genre of music.
GENRE_NOT_FOUND: I didn't find a genre called {{genre}}.
MISSING_ARTIST_NAME: I didn't catch the artist name.
ADDED_ARTIST_SONGS: Added {{count}} songs by {{artist}} to the queue.
MISSING_ALBUM_NAME: Which album would you like to {{action}}? I didn't catch the album name.
ALBUM_NOT_FOUND: I didn't find an album called {{album}}.
ALBUM_ARTIST_NOT_FOUND: I didn't find an artist called {{artist}}.
ALBUM_SUGGESTION: I didn't find an album called {{album}} by {{artist}}, you might have meant {{suggestion}}.
NO_MUSIC_IN_ALBUM: I didn't find any music in the album {{album}}.
QUEUE_FINISHED: There are no more songs left in the queue.
ALBUM_NOT_FOUND_BY_ARTIST: I didn't find an album called {{album}} by {{artist}}.
NO_SONG_PLAYING: There is currently no song playing.
MISSING_MOVIE_NAME: I didn't catch the movie name.
MOVIE_NOT_FOUND: I didn't find a movie called {{movie}}.
NO_VIDEO_SUPPORT: This device doesn't support video playback. Try using an Echo Show or another device with a screen.
MISSING_SERIES_NAME: I didn't catch the series name.
SERIES_NOT_FOUND: I didn't find a series called {{series}}.
MISSING_DEVICE_NAME: I didn't catch the device name to play on.
NO_JELLYFIN_DEVICES: I couldn't find any Jellyfin devices available now.
DEVICE_NOT_FOUND: I couldn't find a device with that name. You can say 'list devices' to hear available devices.
DEVICE_NAME_AMBIGUOUS: I found multiple devices matching that name: {{devices}}. Please be more specific.
SESSION_INACTIVE: That device doesn't appear to have Jellyfin open or active. Open Jellyfin on the device and try again.
PLAYBACK_FAILED: I couldn't start playback on that device. Please try again later.
PLAYBACK_MISMATCH: I couldn't start the requested episode; it's playing {{actual}} instead.
ASK_TO_SELECT_DEVICE: I can play on multiple devices. Say 'change to <device name>' to select one.
NO_VIDEO_CONTEXT: I don't have a recent TV show in context. Ask me to play a series first.
NEXT_EPISODE_NOT_AVAILABLE: I couldn't find a next episode to play for {{series}}.
PREVIOUS_EPISODE_NOT_AVAILABLE: I couldn't find a previous episode for {{series}}.
